    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      The main method of the application first reads data from the previous session if it exists, then launches the application, finally saving the data on application close.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments taken in as a String array

    • saveUsers

      public static void saveUsers​(Photos p)
      This method serializes a photos object holding the list of users from the last session
      Parameters:
      p - the Photos object to serialize
